thread.title: On the Air

title: On the Air
text:
Published October 25. 2015 12:01AM 
Auto Racing 
2:30 p.m., NBCSN — NASCAR Sprint Cup Geico 500 from Talladega, Ala. 
3 p.m., Chs. 10, 30 — Formula One U.S. Grand Prix from Austin, Texas. 
Football 
9:30 a.m., WFAN (660-AM) — NFL: Buffalo Bills vs. Jacksonville Jaguars from London. 
1 p.m., Ch. 3, WTIC (1080-AM), WMOS (102.3-FM) — NFL: New York Jets at New England Patriots. 
1 p.m., Ch. 61 — NFL: New Orleans Saints at Indianapolis Colts. 
4:25 p.m., Ch. 61, WFAN (660-AM), WTIC (1080-AM) — NFL: Dallas Cowboys and New York Giants. 
8:30 p.m., Chs. 10, 30, WFAN (660-AM) — NFL: Philadelphia Eagles at Carolina Panthers. 
Golf 
5 p.m., Golf Channel — PGA: Shriners Hospital for Children Open from Las Vegas. 
Soccer 
7:55 a.m., NBCSN — Premier League: Newcastle at Sunderland. 
10 a.m., NBCSN — Premier League: Manchester City at Manchester United. 
Noon, Chs. 10, 30 — Premier League: Southampton at Liverpool. 
12:30 p.m., FS1 — Bundesliga: Schalke 04 at Monchengladbach. 
3 p.m., FS1 — Women's exhibition: United States vs. Brazil from Orlando, Fla. 
5 p.m., CSN, YES — MLS: New England Revolution at New York City FC. 
5 p.m., FS1 — MLS: D.C. United at Columbus Crew. 
7 p.m., ESPN2 — MLS: Los Angeles Galaxy at Sporting Kansas City. 
Volleyball 
1 p.m., NESN — NCAA women: Virginia Tech at Duke. 
3 p.m., NESN — NCAA women: North Carolina State at Georgia Tech.
